name: FL_DATA_MISS
description: Check fall back options

name: FL_MVAL0
description: Flag to indicate no more retrieval to be done. True if MVAL0< TH_Mmin0

name: FL_MVAL
description: Flag to indicate no more retrieval to be done. True if MVAL < TH_Mmin1

name: FL_R4_NITM
description: Flag indicating that R4 was attempted                                             ,but failed with NITM

name: FL_R4_KDIA
description: Flag indicating R4 was attempted                                                  ,but failed with KDIA

name: FL_R4_COND
description: Flag to indicate R4 attempted                                                     ,but failed COND

name: FL_R3_NITM
description: Flag to indicate R37 attempted                                                    ,failed NITM

name: FL_R3_KDIA
description: Flag to indicate failed KDIA

name: FL_R3_COND
description: Flag to indicate R3 attempted                                                     ,but failed COND

name: FL_R2_NITM
description: Flag to indicate R2 attempted                                                     ,but failed NITM

name: FL_R2_KDIA
description: Flag to indicate failed KDIA

name: FL_R2_COND
description: Flag to indicate R2 attempted                                                     ,but failed COND

name: FL_MD_NITM
description: Flag to indicate additional MD retrieval failed NITM

name: FL_MD_KDIA
description: Flag to indicate failed KDIA

name: FL_MD_COND
description: Flag to indicate Mda failed COND

name: FL_CE
description: Computational exceptions

name: FL_SUN_POINT_C
description: Used to exclude view

name: FL_SUN_GLINT_FOV_C
description: Indicator of possible sun glint effects. Not relevant for SM computations

name: FL_R4_RANGE
description: Set to ON if a retrieved value is outside the extended valid range in R4 retrieval

name: FL_R4_RSTD
description: Set to ON if a retrieved value DQX is greater than the threshold in R4 retrieval

name: FL_R3_RANGE
description: Set to ON if a retrieved value is outside the extended valid range in R3 retrieval

name: FL_R3_RSTD
description: Set to ON if a retrieved value DQX is greater than the threshold in R3 retrieval

name: FL_R2_RANGE
description: Set to ON if a retrieved value is outside the extended valid range in R2 retrieval

name: FL_R2_RSTD
description: Set to ON if a retrieved value DQX is greater than the threshold in R2 retrieval

name: FL_MDA_RANGE
description: Set to ON if a retrieved value is outside the extended valid range

name: FL_MDA_RSTD
description: Set to ON if a retrieved value DQX is greater than the threshold in Mda retrieval
